title: Pipeline into Persia
creator_credit: Humphrey Swingler, Greenpark Productions and Roland Stafford
brief_description: A colourful account of the construction of the Ahwaz-Asna section of the Trans-Iranian pipeline. Received Honourable Mention at the Harrogate of Films in the Service of Industry, 1957.
